topic.title: Therapy of homosexual sickness with free normal sex in nazi Germany - ordered by Himmler
topic.body:
People suffering from the mental sickness of homosexuality were concentrated in the Third Reich Germany to be cured and teached to the joys of the normal sexual act with volontary prostitutes - by order from Heinrich Himmler.
Heger claims in his book that Himmler directed that all gay prisoners were to make compulsory visits to the camp brothel once per week as a means of curing them of their perverse sexual orientation.
(The Men With the Pink Triangle)(LGBT AND JEWISH)
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heinz_Heger
https://web.archive.org/web/20090704070743/http://www.huc.edu/tartak/events/07/BibliographyLGBT%26Jewish.pdf
http://www.ausdemleben.at/heger.pdf 
During this time the homosexuals were jailed under hardest conditions in America and Britain and could only dream about such good treatment.
